title: Smoosh1800
author: Smoosh1800
content: Get in early and earn first-mover advantage!◆◆◆ What is Aglet? ◆◆◆This is a game (application) where you can earn sneakers by walking.Walking earns " Aglet " an in-game currency, which can be used to purchase sneakers.※The sneakers you can get are on the Metaverse (virtual) and you can also get real sneakers.It was announced that NFTs, which will be available for sale beginning May 14, will be exchangeable for ETH and USDC.(The exchange of ETH and USDC will be implemented in the third quarter of 2022.)◆ The management team has a solid background and track record, ◆ making this a very credible project Aglet's CEO is a former director of Adidas.◆◆◆ Sneakers available in the game ◆◆◆NIKE, Adidas, New Balance, Asics, Vans, etc.The game can be started with no initial cost, so anyone can get started right away.Come on, let's join!➀ https://aglet.app/shareOnce you have installed the application, register.②Set your own avatar (can be changed later) and choose the first sneakers available.③Enter code "KJ901E" to get 1,000 Aglet.With 1,000 Aglet, you can purchase a pair of sneakers.※1,000 Aglet will be airdropped when you reach 10,000 steps!#NFT #NFTs #ETH #USDC #Airdrop

comments.author: Smoosh1800
comments.body: The number of users currently exceeds 500,000.

comments.author: Miiike
comments.body: I am interested with the part of your statement where you said the management has solid background and track records. I didn't dig deep enough, but quickly strolling past your website didn't seems to show any section about team details. Can you please help on this matter?I also learned that your twitter page has been around since 2020, is this means your project has been existing since 2020 too?
